user_description: Converts Reaction and Compound CSV files to FBAModel object in workspace.

user_options.name: genome
user_options.help: Identifier for Genome which contains features referenced to in FBAModel (Defaults to empty Genome).

user_options.name: output
user_options.help: ID for output FBAModel in workspace.

user_options.name: out_ws
user_options.help: Workspace ID for saving output FBAModel.

user_options.name: biomass
user_options.help: ID of biomass reaction in Reaction CSV File.
